Title: Relates to enacting the "ghostbuster act"
Summary: Enhances enforcement of laws requiring proper and readable license plates and vehicle identification numbers; increases penalties including booting.
LawCode: Amd V & T L, generally; amd ยง1.20, CP L; amd ยง19-169.2, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, the criminal procedure law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to improving enforcement of violations related to license plates
